header.description:
Determines whether the API waits while fetching latest content. By default, the header is not set and the API serves stale content (if [cached by the CDN](https://kontent.ai/learn/link-to/id/80a237b0-f7bc-45c4-8b76-5da5d7578fc8)) while fetching the new content to minimize wait time.

The header can be useful if you know that the requested content had changed since your last request in a reaction to a [webhook](https://kontent.ai/learn/link-to/id/27f26a32-33ec-4b4c-b46e-edc022e15f87) notification.
